title: [Self-directed] Mobile Learning Multimedia Development Project to Enhance Secondary English Communication Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of secondary-level English grammar and vocabulary
context.additional_context: A non-real-time mobile environment optimized for smartphone-based learning, aimed at enhancing practical English communication skills linked to the science field.

learning_goals: Learners design one mobile learning multimedia prototype following the 4D development model (Define, Design, Develop, Deploy), create ≥3 wireframes using Figma or Adobe XD, and implement basic interaction features with Unity or Unreal Engine for submission.

Learners design ≥3 formative assessment items (e.g., student response surveys, portfolios) for evaluating secondary-level English communication skills, apply them to five peer learners, and submit improved versions based on feedback.
Master at least 10 key expressions required to explain scientific topics in English

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
